All.title: 2D Minecraft
All.description: Mine, Craft, Build! Lets play a 2D version of Minecraft!

All.title: Chess Game
All.description: Play Chess against AI at various difficulty levels, or log in to challenge other players online.

All.title: Rubik's Cube
All.description: Are you familiar with the famous Rubik's Cube? Challenge yourself with an online version with custom settings.

All.title: To Do App
All.description: A simple, yet effective To-do App.

All.title: Wave Packet
All.description: A simulation of Physical concepts in Physics - wave: phase, velocity, wavelength, and pulse width.

All.title: Wave Interference
All.description: A simulation of Physical experiment: Young's experiment on wave interference.

All.title: Fateful Dice
All.description: Choose the number of dice total result and you are guaranteed to get the same result every time you roll the dice.

All.title: Speech Emotion Recognition
All.description: A machine learning speech emotion recognition project that classifies the emotion of a person from a speech audio.

All.title: Deep Fake Detection
All.description: A deep learning project that classifies whether a video is a real or a deep fake.
